1000000011011100 0000100101001000 0 -> sum: 1000101000100100, cout: 0

0100000111001100 1001100000100000 0 -> sum: 1101100111101100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
